bug.author: jrabary
bug.summary: TF 2.0 Documents how BatchNormalization update is handle in TF 2.0
bug.description:
When training model that need specific update such as batch norm mean and variance, it is not clear from the current version of documentations how we can handle this. This docs <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r2.0/api_docs/python/tf/keras/Model>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r2.0/api_docs/python/tf/keras/Model</denchmark-link> suggests that we have to call While here <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/r2/tutorials/generative/dcgan.ipynb>https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/r2/tutorials/generative/dcgan.ipynb</denchmark-link> there's nothing about System information
TensorFlow version: 2.0-preview

comments.comment: model.updates is not in TF2 now. Thanks
